product_overview: This product is a Next.js project scanning tool designed to detect and automatically fix TypeScript, build, runtime, UI, performance, SEO, and accessibility issues, ensuring a stable, optimized final application.
core_goals: Identify and fix all TypeScript type errors.
Resolve build and runtime crashes automatically.
Correct UI bugs and layout inconsistencies.
Enhance overall application performance, SEO, and accessibility scores.
Generate clear and comprehensive error reports for developers.
Deliver a clean, build-ready version of the project with high quality standards.
key_features: Automated scanning of the Next.js codebase for TypeScript and runtime errors.
Auto-fix capabilities for safe errors without manual intervention.
Detailed error reporting with explanations for detected problems.
Improvements targeting UI layout bugs and animation handling.
Enhancements to SEO and accessibility to meet industry standards.
Integration with the existing Sidebar Navigation and Global Layout features for seamless fixes.
user_flow_summary: User initiates a project scan to analyze the current Next.js codebase.
The tool detects and categorizes errors in TypeScript, build/runtime, UI, performance, SEO, and accessibility.
Safe and automated fixes are applied to the detected issues.
A clear error report is generated summarizing all fixes and outstanding issues.
The final project output is verified to be build-ready with no errors and optimized for Lighthouse scores above 90.
validation_criteria: No build or runtime crashes after auto-fix.
UI bugs and layout issues resolved as measured by visual regression tests.
Performance, SEO, and accessibility metrics achieve Lighthouse scores greater than 90.
Error reports are clear, consistent, and actionable.
Final project build succeeds without manual intervention.

features.name: Sidebar Navigation
features.description: Collapsible sidebar with navigation links, animated transitions, and active state handling.

features.name: Global Layout
features.description: Root layout defining the main structure including Sidebar and Navbar placement.
